m_descr: This module demonstrates some of the concepts for the development with Z-Way.
l_example_parameter_help:
This parameter have to assign with a numeric value.
Tipp: HTML-Code can be used for formatting.
l_other_virtual_device_help:
This selection list contains all binary switches, is defined through namespaces
Possible namespaces are by default:
devices_sensorMultilevel, devices_sensorBinary, devices_switchMultilevel, devices_switchBinary, devices_all
